record.description: Radio Committee in executive session. Will welcome suggestions and appreciate signs of interest. Standing, left to right: Dean B. C. H. Harvey, Professor Arthur P. Scott, Bill Hay, famous WMAQ announcer, Professor Emery Filbey, Professor T. V. Smith, Allen Miller, Dean Henry Gordon Gale, Dean Gordon J. Laing, W. G. Preston. Seated: Rowland Haynes, Dean Shailer Matthews, Professor Frank Herbert O'Hara, Professor H. F. Mallory, William Hedges, business manager of WMAQ, Professor Percy H. Boynton, and Miss Hazel Huntley, program director of WMAQ.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: UC Magazine stamp. See UC Magazine, 1930.
